name: StampFense - A stamp tower defense game
name_original: StampFense - A stamp tower defense game
description:
Welcome to StampFense, a stamp tower defense game, where you defeat the enemies by building towers as well as stamping them in the ground with your powerful clicks!

This is the first prototype of StampFense. Be one of the first to try out my new game and influence the further development with your feedback! 

Current features:

  • play 20 waves or infinity mode
  • defeat 4 different types of enemies
  • build and upgrade 11 different towers with unique super powers
  • destroy the enemies by attacking them with your mouse clicks
  • use 5 more skills to increase the strength of your clicks

If you liked the game and don't want to miss future updates, then follow me:
Facebook
Twitter
Instagram
